title: My Post Board
desc: Post and comments full-stack CRUD project. Includes users registration and login.Data is saved to relational database.

title: Table Reservation
desc: REST API for table reservation in restaurant. Reservation is confirmed via email and kept in database.

title: Codewars Java
desc: Codewars katas solutions written in Java for multiple problems and algorithms to solve/implement with appropriate complexity

title: Effects of Alcohol
desc: Data anylisis project. Shows effects of alcohol on life factors using linear and polynominal regression with results on the plots
